vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μεννά (L, Μεννᾶς, -ᾶ; Rec. Μαϊνάν) ὁ,
Menna: Luk.3:31.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.31;
son of: Mattatha (G3160);
father of: Melea (G3190)
§ Mainan
Mainan (Proper name)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
買南 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "預言者: 著魔的"
在耶穌基督族譜中, 約瑟的一位組先 (路 3:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
买南 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "预言者: 着魔的"
在耶稣基督族谱中, 约瑟的一位组先 (路 3:31)
